pr_title: xds: accept all forms of gkeClusterUrl and fix the 'x-goog-request-params' value

timeline.message: xds: accept all forms of gkeClusterUrl and fix the 'x-goog-request-params' value

timeline.bodyText: Is (.*) the same as .*? Seems you are not capturing groups.
timeline.author: dapengzhang0

replies.bodyText:
(.*) is a capturing group and I am capturing only 2 groups (to get the project name and the cluster name). The only change here is from:
locations
to
(?:locations|zones)
And the initial ?: makes it a non-capturing group.
replies.author: sanjaypujare

replies.bodyText:
to get the project name and the cluster name

To get the cluster name, why not /clusters/(.*)? I might misunderstand the URI.
replies.author: dapengzhang0

replies.bodyText:
Oh, I see you are actually getting project name and zone name
https://github.com/grpc/grpc-java/blob/master/xds/src/main/java/io/grpc/xds/internal/certprovider/MeshCaCertificateProviderProvider.java#L245-L246
replies.author: dapengzhang0

replies.bodyText:
Oops, sorry I made a mistake in my previous comment. I don't need the cluster name but just the project name and the location (or zone) name. And that's why use the first capturing group for the part following /projects/ and the second one for the part following either /locations/ or /zones/ which is why I have the (?:locations|zones) expression.
The GkeClusterUrl is of the form: https://container.googleapis.com/$VERSION/projects/$PROJECT/$LOCATIONS/$ZONE/clusters/$CLUSTER
where $LOCATIONS is either locations or zones
replies.author: sanjaypujare
